extendedInfo.description: The best Japanese English Dictionary app is now on Android phone and tablet. It covers over 350,000 words and phrases of the contemporary Japanese language, along with example sentences, audio pronunciations, fastest search speed, flexible search methods, and more â¦ FEATURES â Over 350K Japanese words & phrases â Example sentences â Audio pronunciation â Spelling suggestions â Search history record â Fastest search speed â Flexible search (by Kanji, Kana, Romaji or English) â Share learning progress via social networksâ Flashcard display for every Japanese wordâ Optimized for Android phone and tablet"Japanese English Dictionary" is easiest to use & best designed for ANYONE who are desperate to learn reading & writing Japanese words as well as speaking Japanese in action. Asia Opportunities & Japanese are HOT TOPICS. The future is in Asia while Japanese is one of the most popular languages of the world & that Japan remains one of largest economy in the world, learning Japanese language is urgent & important. Tip for you: THE EARLY BIRD GETS THE WORM! Learn Japanese ASAP & reach the DOOR OF SUCCESS!Acknowledgment: This app includes the data of EDict files are the property of the Electronic Dictionary Research and Development Group, and are used in conformance with the Group's license. See http://www.csse.monash.edu.au/~jwb/edict.html and http://www.edrdg.org/. The Text To Speech is from Google. We are not affiliated with these services.If you require any assistance, please contact us at cs_google@bravolol.com.Dictionary Keywords: free, jlpt, translate, learn, vocabulary, translator, lesson, course, kanji, kana, study, word, japan

reviews.title: Best one I\'ve seen yet
reviews.comment: This is the best english to japanese dictionary I have seen yet. Mostly because it actually works! I also like this one b/c you can use either japanese or english, and it comes up with really good results. 5/5 for this one.
reviews.author: Nicole Audi

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: But please add the ability to copy and paste from the example sentences.  Or even link directly to definitions of all the words in them
reviews.author: Rick Harris

reviews.title: Easy and fun
reviews.comment: Even my 2 year old likes this. Ive spent so far 6.5hrs dwnlding and uninstalling apps to learn Japanese. So far this is the best ever AWESOME. Thank you. More stars would happen if it saved to my sd card not internal mem. And does not repeat words to pick up on. With that said. This is on my phone. Just what i was looking for.

reviews.title: Good overall, but could use larger vocabulary.
reviews.comment: Overall, this is a very nice app.  It is easy to use and gives you word translations both ways       Japanese <=> Romanji <=> English It gives you the Japanese kanji, the phonetic Romanji,  properly spelled English words and pronunciations for both Japanese and English.   The one thing that would make it much, much better would be to have a larger vocabulary, especially in Japanese!   It would be nice if it included English translations for words commonly used in manga, anime and other forms of Japanese fiction--even if those words are generally considered slang.  Even if less than perfect, I would and have recommended this app to others!
reviews.author: Robert Branstetter

reviews.title: Easy to learn!
reviews.comment: I feel like I can absorb Japanese language naturally from this book! 5 stars! :^) Thank you!
